pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Simple udev rule for SPI access on the Raspberry Pi 3. Ensures that the /dev/spidevN.M devices are read/write by the wheel group, not just root.
Unlike rpi3-i2cdev, this does not install an init.d service; the necessary module will be modprobed automatically, by the dtparam=spi=on entry in /boot/config.txt.
